message: Let's make a deal Bob. I take $60, you take $40. It's a good offer for you considering the inflation.
Considering the inflation, my offer is quite generous. I suggest we settle on 55-45.
Bob, the inflation is eating away at the value. Let's be reasonable, I'll take $55, you take $45. It's my final offer.
You said it was your final offer, but I'm willing to make one more deal. Considering the inflation, I'm being more than fair with 58-42.
